title: Tom Pidcock Confirms Move to Team Q36.5 After Ineos Grenadiers Divorce
content:
Pidcock signs with second-division Swiss squad on three-year deal: 'It’s an adventure and I’m excited for it.'

Read the full article at Tom Pidcock Confirms Move to Team Q36.5 After Ineos Grenadiers Divorce on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
